com.qtplaf.library.trading.server.servers.dukascopy

Class DkOrder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.trading.server.servers.dukascopy.DkOrder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Order

    public class DkOrder
extends java.lang.Object
implements Order
    Dukascopy implementation of the Order interface.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DkOrder(DkServer server, com.dukascopy.api.IOrder order)
      Constructor assigning the Dukascopy order.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Sends a request to fully close position by market price or cancel entry order.
      void close(double amount)
      Sends a request to close the position with specified amount, by market price and default slippage.
      void close(double amount, double price)
      Sends a request to close the position with specified amount and price, and default slippage.
      void close(double amount, double price, double slippage)
      Sends a request to close the position with specified, price and slippage.
      double getAmount()
      Returns amount of the order.
      java.util.List<OrderHistory> getCloseHistory()
      Returns the ordered history of order closing.
      double getClosePrice()
      Returns the close price or 0 if the order was not closed or partially closed.
      long getCloseTime()
      Returns the time when the broker closed the order.
      java.lang.String getComment()
      Returns comment that was set when the order was submitted
      double getCommission()
      Returns the position comission in the account currency.
      double getCommissionInUSD()
      Returns the position comission in USD.
      long getCreationTime()
      Returns the time when the order was accepted by the broker.
      long getExpirationTime()
      Returns time when order will be cancelled or 0 if order is "good till cancel"
      java.util.List<OrderHistory> getFillHistory()
      Returns the history of order filling.
      long getFillTime()
      Returns time when the order was filled.
      java.lang.String getId()
      Returns the order identifier.
      Instrument getInstrument()
      Returns the instrument.
      java.lang.String getLabel()
      Returns the label set at creation time.
      double getOpenPrice()
      Returns entry level the price for conditional orders, or the price for filled or closed orders.
      OrderCommand getOrderCommand()
      Returns the order command, or simply Buy or Sell when the order has been filled.
      OrderState getOrderState()
      Returns the current order state.
      double getOriginalAmount()
      Returns original constant amount of the order.
      double getProfitLoss()
      Returns the profit/loss in the account currency.
      double getProfitLossInPips()
      Returns the profit/loss in pips.
      double getProfitLossInUSD()
      Returns the profit/loss in USD.
      double getRequestedAmount()
      Returns the requested amount.
      double getStopLossPrice()
      Returns the price of stop loss condition or 0 if stop loss condition is not set.
      OfferSide getStopLossSide()
      Returns the side used to check the stop loss condition.
      double getTakeProfitPrice()
      Returns the price of take profit condition or 0 if the take profit condition is not set.
      double getTrailingStep()
      Returns the current trailing step or 0 if no trailing step is set.
      boolean isClosed()
      Returns a boolean indicating if the order is closed.
      boolean isLong()
      Returns a boolean that indicates whether this is a long or short order.
      boolean isShort()
      Returns a boolean that indicates whether this is a long or short order.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
           throws ServerException
        Sends a request to fully close position by market price or cancel entry order. If order has both pending and filled parts, both will be closed/canceled.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Order
        Throws:
        ServerException - If a server error occurs.

      • close

        public void close(double amount)
           throws ServerException
        Sends a request to close the position with specified amount, by market price and default slippage.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Order
        Parameters:
        amount - The requested amount to close.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If a server error occurs.

      • close

        public void close(double amount,
                  double price)
           throws ServerException
        Sends a request to close the position with specified amount and price, and default slippage.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Order
        Parameters:
        amount - The requested amount to close.
        price - The desired price.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If a server error occurs.

                  double price,

        price - The desired price.

        public double getStopLossPrice()
        Returns the price of stop loss condition or 0 if stop loss condition is not set. Orders submitted with stop loss condition, will have this price set only after server accepts order.
